actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to limit cost-of-living increases under the Federal Employees' Compensation Act for a specified period of time.

summary.text: Limits cost-of-living increases under the Federal Employee's Compensation Act to 5 percent for the period January 1, 1975, through June 30, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to limit cost-of-living increases under the Federal Employees' Compensation Act for a specified period of time.
